Title: Irisen
Description:
Irisen is a game engine, designer and executer system. This system is designed for building RPG or SLG games, but it's also useful for others in some aspects.

This project is developed in C# language using Sliverlight, WPF and XNA techniques.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

Irisen is a game engine, designer and executer system. This system is designed for building RPG or SLG games, but it's also useful for others in some aspects.

This project is developed in C# language using Sliverlight, WPF and XNA techniques.

Target Platform

This project is subjected to 2 user groups, These 2 groups may have different software requiements.

For Developer

Developers should have Silverlight 4 (for web data designer), .NET Framework 4.0 (for client data designer, packager and debugger) and XNA 4.0 (for visual designer) installed in their computers.

For Runner

Runners should have .NET Framework 4.0 and XNA 4.0 installed in their computers.

Architecture

To see the architecture of this project, please visit the Project Architecture Page.
